summary: The Better Magic mod of yore rebalanced for a new age. These are my personal tweaks for a better magic system.
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Tahoma][color=#f1c232][size=5]Better Magic Rebalanced[/size][/color][/font][/center]
This is my personal tweaked version of [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/4374/?tab=1&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmoddescription%2F%3Fid%3D4374%26preview%3D&pUp=1]Better Magic[/url] by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/851501/?]sushisquid[/url]. The primary things that have changed are the way spell bonuses progress and elemental damage modifiers and resistances.

Currently two versions, Version 1 and Version 1B. Changes include:

[color=#00ff00][size=4]Version 1:[/size][/color]
[color=#ffd966][size=4]Progression:[/size][/color]
Novice perks will only give a 5% bonus, the Apprentice and Adept perks will give a 10% bonus, and the Expert and Master perks will give a 15% bonus. This is to give a better sense of progression for your character and to keep magic in the early game from getting too strong too fast.

[color=#ffd966][size=4]Augment Element perks rebalanced:[/size][/color]
20% and 40% damage increase and 5% and 10% elemental resistance at each perk rank.

Elemental destruction spells can now be 5% stronger than Vanilla at Expert level perks.

[color=#00ffff][size=4]Version 1B:[/size][/color]
[color=#ffd966][size=4]Progression:[/size][/color]
Novice perks give no bonus, the Apprentice perks give a 5% bonus, Adept 10%, Expert 15%, Master 20%. This is to make you earn better magic in the late game.

[color=#ffd966][size=4]Augment Element perks rebalanced:[/size][/color]
15% and 30% damage increase and 5% and 10% elemental resistance at each perk rank. This combined with 20% bonus of Master Destruction perk gives you Vanilla 50% damage boost but you have to work for it.


Be sure to visit the original Better Magic's mod page because without it this mod wouldn't be possible.
